articles.title: Majority of Australians not convinced Prince Charles should be king, Vote Compass reveals - ABC News
articles.description: Prince Charles is next in line to take over as Australia's head of state, but data reveals there is growing support for a republic.
articles.content:
A slim majority of Australians appear opposed to Prince Charles becoming king when Queen Elizabeth II dies, according to data from the ABC's Vote Compass.

articles.title: SpaceX capsule brings astronauts home - The West Australian
articles.description: A SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule carrying four astronauts has splashed down off Florida after the crew spent nearly six months at the International Space Station.
